if @@admin = 0 and @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@@admin, @@userID, 'SFCEmployeeGroupDeclaration', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end
&Checking; &EndErrorMode;
declare @count int, @k int

-- Checking
select top 0 ma_nh, ngay_hl, ma_ca, ma_nc, he_so, line_nbr into #d1 from sfctkbnhnc select @count = count(*) from @@table
if @count > 0 begin select top 0 ma_nh, ngay_hl, ma_ca, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id1 from sfkbnhnc insert into #id1(ma_nh, ngay_hl, ma_ca, stt) select ma_nh, ngay_hl, ma_ca, min(stt) from @@table group by ma_nh, ngay_hl, ma_ca select @k = count(*) from #id1
insert into #d1 select b.ma_nh, b.ngay_hl, b.ma_ca, a.ma_nc, a.he_so, (a.stt - b.stt) + 1 from @@table a join #id1 b on (a.ma_nh = b.ma_nh and a.ngay_hl = b.ngay_hl and a.ma_ca = b.ma_ca) order by a.ma_nh, a.ngay_hl, a.ma_ca, a.stt

-- Insert @@inserting(master); @@inserting(detail); end

insert into #d2 select b.ma_nh, b.ngay_hl, b.ma_ca, a.ma_nc, a.he_so, (a.stt - b.stt) + 1 from #k a join #id2 b on (a.ma_nh = b.ma_nh and a.ngay_hl = b.ngay_hl and a.ma_ca = b.ma_ca) order by a.ma_nh, a.ngay_hl, a.ma_ca, a.stt
select top 0 ma_nh, ngay_hl, ma_ca into #m2 from sfkbnhnc insert into #m2 select a.ma_nh, a.ngay_hl, a.ma_ca from #k a join #id2 b on a.stt = b.stt
